title: 1 FPS
body: Well, in my games I get a fine 50-70 FPS, but then occasionally I my FPS drops to 1 and never goes up. I've tried disabling shadows, lowering my graphics etc. To solve this, I have to restart my laptop during games to stop the 1 FPS. I'm tired of this issue. It has lead me to many losses in games and sometimes leaverbusters.

replies.body:
Boost your FPS by utilising the **[Frames for days booster.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting)** This booster is legal and is approved by Riot.

http://riot-web-static.s3.amazonaws.com/images/news/Skins/Tristana_RocketGirl_Splash.jpg
